p: Likewise, herbarium materials could be a resource of chemical data potentially relevant for chemotaxonomy (Cook et al., 2009; Yilmaz et al., 2012), chemical ecology (Zangerl and Berenbaum, 2005), environmental bioindicators (Foan et al., 2010; Monforte et al., 2015) as well as drug discovery and authentication (Saslis-Lagoudakis et al., 2015; RÃ¸nsted et al., 2017).
